text: Rwose Allah yamaze kwakira ukwicuza k’Umuhanuzi (Muhamadi) n’abimukira (bavuye i Maka bajya i Madina) ndetse n’abaturage b’i Madina (babakiriye), na ba bandi bakurikiye (Intumwa Muhamadi) mu bihe bigoye (urugamba rwa Tabuki), nyuma y’uko imitima ya bamwe muri bo yari hafi yo kudohoka ku kuri, maze yakira ukwicuza kwabo. Mu by'ukuri, We ni Nyiribambe, Nyirimbabazi kuri bo
